#summary Download page
=Baical v0.5=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Baical_v0.5.zip Download] latest version.
Changes list:
 * P7.Telemetry viewer: New renderer, processor, new functionality, error fixes
 * P7.Telemetry storage: Error fixes
 * P7.Trace viewer: enhance scrolling
 * Auto-check for updates
 * P7.Server: optimization

=Angara v0.9.8=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Angara_v0.9.8.zip Download]  latest version.
Changes list:
 * Send internal logs to Baical server
 * TMF parsing error fix 

=P7 Library v1.7=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ Checkout] latest source code:
Changes list:
 * P7 objects (client, trace, telemetry) shared memory. You can create one instance on P7.Trace object for example and retreive pointer for it from any module of your application.
